Node.definition: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a countable entity is the ninth in a range
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a marker drawing the reader's attention to the object or event directly following it and identifying it with emphasis as the object or event in focus, as opposed to other, similar objects and events

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
literally: to lean on; hence: = action by which an army puts pressure on a city by laying siege to it
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= town; ◄ in Mesopotamia (שִׁנְעָר) ► founded by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) location of tower of Babel; capital of Chaldean (כַּשְׂדִּים) empire
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

= a marker drawing the reader's attention to the object or event directly following it and identifying it with emphasis as the object or event in focus, as opposed to other, similar objects and events

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a rounded container ◄ usually made of ceramic or metal ► used for storage or cooking

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= causative action by which humans cause a liquid to flow from one place to another
= to bring together people, animals, plants, and/or other things from different places for a common purpose
= state in which objects are of a high quality and/or a pleasure to look at
= the upper part of the leg of humans and animals
= the joint between each arm and the main part of the human body; ► often used for carrying heavy weights
= state in which persons or objects have been selected for their superior competencies or quality
= any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength
= causative action by which someone causes a certain location, container, or surface to be filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left
= state in which persons or objects have been selected for their superior competencies or quality

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= causative action by which someone arranges objects in a heap
= any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength
= causative action by which humans bring water to a temperature in which it starts bubbling
read נתחיה (נֵתַח) as in verses 4 and 6

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= causative process by which humans prepare food for consumption by immersing it in boiling water for a prolonged period
= any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
exclamation expressing grief and dismay

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts
= a rounded container ◄ usually made of ceramic or metal ► used for storage or cooking
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state in which metals are covered with reddish or yellowish brown coating ◄ as a result of a process of oxidation; ≈ associated with sin and guilt
= state in which metals are covered with reddish or yellowish brown coating ◄ as a result of a process of oxidation; ≈ associated with sin and guilt

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

Node.gloss: to bring out|to take out|to carry out|to make (someone) leave|to make (someone) depart
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans, animals, or objects to leave a certain place or position
literally: the lot falls (on someone); hence: = process by which individuals or groups are selected by throwing lots
= the process of arriving at a decision based on casting the lot

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
= area with an even surface without vegetation, ► so that all objects located there are clearly visible

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place
literally: to pour out blood; hence: = to wound or kill an animate being

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= causative action by which humans or deities cover a surface with their hands, a piece of cloth, a substance, or an object, ► often with the purpose of making this surface invisible or inaccessible
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
literally: to cause to come up; hence: = causative process by which an activity is caused to increase in intensity
= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
= area with an even surface without vegetation, ► so that all objects located there are clearly visible
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= causative action by which humans or deities cover a surface with their hands, a piece of cloth, a substance, or an object, ► often with the purpose of making this surface invisible or inaccessible

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
exclamation expressing grief and dismay

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= causative process by which a deity causes events to increase in intensity
= quantity of objects lying one on another
= a single piece of wood taken from a tree, cut and finished, and used for building and construction
= causative action by which someone causes a fire to increase its intensity by stirring it or adding fuel

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat
= any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength
= to be partially or totally consumed ◄ as a result of having been exposed to extremely high temperatures;
= carbonized material resulting from heating wood, ► and used for cooking or warming

Node.gloss: to be warm|to be hot|to become warm|to become hot
Node.definition: = process by which human or inanimate objects feel or become warm or hot
= to be partially or totally consumed ◄ as a result of having been exposed to extremely high temperatures;

= something that causes humans, animals, or objects to be regarded by the law as having been contaminated, as a result of which anything that touches them may become contaminated as well; ► humans, animals, and objects that are unclean cannot participate in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures
= state in which metals are covered with reddish or yellowish brown coating ◄ as a result of a process of oxidation; ≈ associated with sin and guilt
= action by which someone exerts his strength for a certain purpose

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= state in which metals are covered with reddish or yellowish brown coating ◄ as a result of a process of oxidation; ≈ associated with sin and guilt

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= state in which metals are covered with reddish or yellowish brown coating ◄ as a result of a process of oxidation; ≈ associated with sin and guilt

= something that causes humans, animals, or objects to be regarded by the law as having been contaminated, as a result of which anything that touches them may become contaminated as well; ► humans, animals, and objects that are unclean cannot participate in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures
literally: plan; hence: = a state of moral and ethical corruption, starting with evil plans and resulting in depraved practices, ≈ regarded as foolishness
= a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes
= causative process by which people cause an area or object to be free from dirt, contamination and everything else that is not supposed to be present
= process by which an area or object becomes free from dirt, contamination and everything else that is not supposed to be present

= something that causes humans, animals, or objects to be regarded by the law as having been contaminated, as a result of which anything that touches them may become contaminated as well; ► humans, animals, and objects that are unclean cannot participate in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures
= process by which an area or object becomes free from dirt, contamination and everything else that is not supposed to be present
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to do something that may have a negative effect on someone or something else; ◄ usually caused by an emotion of affection or compassion
= state by which humans or deities are having second thoughts about past actions or plans for the future
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= a pattern of activities performed by a person or deity, with the primary focus on whether these activities are good or evil
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= inanimate objects that are the object of someone's desire, ◄ because of their quality or value

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
literally: heavy blow; = action by which humans or deites cause serious harm, injury, epidemic, or other affliction affecting an individual or group of people

= action by which human perform the mourning ritual for someone who has died, or for another tragic event; this may include wailing (ילל) tearing one's clothes, putting on sackcloth (שַׂק) covering oneself with dust or ashes, fasting (צום) or eating specific food, cutting oneself (גדד) shaving one's head (קרח) covering part of one's face, etc.; this usually takes place during a specific period of time and ends after the burial has taken place, but it may also be repeated in later days to commemorate a tragic event

Node.gloss: to cry|to weep|to lament|to mourn|to bewail
Node.definition: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
= fluid appearing in the eye; ≈ primarily associated with grief and mourning
= action by which humans make a deep inarticulate sound ◄ caused by pain, grief, or severe suffering

Node.gloss: to be silent|to keep silent|to remain silent|to be silenced
Node.definition: = to refrain from speaking
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= a state of grief, caused by bereavement, loss, or other difficult circumstances, and which is shown by one's actions

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= head dress; ◄ made out of cloth; ► worn by priests, but also by ordinary men and women, probably on special occasions; not to be worn when in mourning; ≈ therefore associated with joy
= action by which humans wrap something around part of their body
= a covering for the foot ◄ usually made of leather or wood ► either open and laced around the foot or ankle with a strap, or closed around the foot like a shoe

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= causative action by which someone puts an object on top of or in front of something else
= body hair growing above the upper lip
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans (or deities by human hands) cause land, buildings, or other objects to be unfit for religious use ◄ usually by unlawful behavior

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= place that has been consecrated to a deity, where that deity is said to reside and is worshiped
= state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
literally: strong; hence: = state in which a state or process takes place with intensity
= inanimate objects that are the object of someone's desire, ◄ because of their quality or value

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= object for which one feels affection

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
literally: to fall; hence: = process by which humans are killed or severely wounded by enemies

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= body hair growing above the upper lip
= causative action by which someone puts an object on top of or in front of something else
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= head dress; ◄ made out of cloth; ► worn by priests, but also by ordinary men and women, probably on special occasions; not to be worn when in mourning; ≈ therefore associated with joy

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= a covering for the foot ◄ usually made of leather or wood ► either open and laced around the foot or ankle with a strap, or closed around the foot like a shoe

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

= action by which human perform the mourning ritual for someone who has died, or for another tragic event; this may include wailing (ילל) tearing one's clothes, putting on sackcloth (שַׂק) covering oneself with dust or ashes, fasting (צום) or eating specific food, cutting oneself (גדד) shaving one's head (קרח) covering part of one's face, etc.; this usually takes place during a specific period of time and ends after the burial has taken place, but it may also be repeated in later days to commemorate a tragic event

Node.gloss: to cry|to weep|to lament|to mourn|to bewail
Node.definition: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
= state in which humans have lost their inner composure ◄ as a result of guilt
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
= action by which humans make a deep inarticulate sound ◄ caused by pain, grief, or severe suffering

Node.gloss: a man ... his brother > one ... each other
Node.definition: = expression denoting a situation in which two people or objects that are regarded as masculine are involved in a reciprocal event
= man; ◄ son of Buzi (בּוּזִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) and prophet (נָבִיא)
= object or event that reminds of something that has happened or as a confirmation of something that is yet to happen
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= large fortification; for the defense of a town; built of stone; could consist of one extra strong building or of a complex of buildings surrounded by its own strong wall; ≈ associated with protection and security and often used as an epithet for God

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= inanimate objects that are the object of someone's desire, ◄ because of their quality or value

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= information concerning a things that have happened
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: to open (someone else's) mouth; hence: = causative action by which deities give humans or animals the ability to speak
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to be dumb|to be unable to speak
Node.definition: = to be unable to speak ◄ because of a physical limitation or because of emotions
= object or event that reminds of something that has happened or as a confirmation of something that is yet to happen
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
